title: How To Navigate Weight Loss When You’re On Your Period
itunes:title: How To Navigate Weight Loss When You’re On Your Period
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

As usual I am on my period at podcast time. Today we talk about what to do for bloat, how to stop pre-planning your misery, and just how to deal with the cravings and mood swings. Kathy talks about not having one anymore and I am in the midst of Mother Nature's Vengeance.
